pkgmetadata.longdescription: Open notebooks from the command linenbopen looks for the nearest running notebook server - if it finds one, itopens a web browser to that notebook. If not, it starts a new notebook serverin that directory.Installation:: python3 -m pip install nbopenUsage:: nbopen AwesomeNotebook.ipynbTo integrate with your file manager, so you can double click on notebooksto open them, run:* Linux/BSD: ``python3 -m nbopen.install_xdg``* Windows: ``python3 -m nbopen.install_win``* Mac: Clone the repository and run ``./osx-install.sh``
